title: NEED RANKED TEAM
body:
Hey guys,

My ign is 'MARYJAYN', I have been playing league for a while now, and I'm looking for a ranked team. i play most days and am keen to join a team. i can play all roles but i suck at support.. if i were to chose a role is would rank it in this order.. jungle, mid, adc, top, support. i am probably best at mid but its gotten boring for me.. Hit me up on league or in the comments if your interested in me.

Thankyou.
